welcome-sentence: Welcome {{name}} to EduPlay, where education meets fun! We believe that learning should be an exciting adventure. Our platform blends education with play, making it enjoyable for learners of all ages. Dive into interactive lessons, engaging activities, and games designed to spark curiosity and foster a love for learning. Let's make education a joyful experience together!s
welcome-sentence-not-user: Welcome to EduPlay, where education meets fun! We believe that learning should be an exciting adventure. Our platform blends education with play, making it enjoyable for learners of all ages. Dive into interactive lessons, engaging activities, and games designed to spark curiosity and foster a love for learning. Let's make education a joyful experience together!s
error-login-text: Error with email, password, or both
footer-team: Developed by Binary Brains - Faculty of Computer and Information Science.
contact-heading: Get in touch with us! Feel free to send us a message, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
name: Name
answer-submitted: Answer is Submitted Successfully you got {{rank}}
five-hints-description: Five Hints is a thrilling guessing game where you test your knowledge by uncovering the correct answer with minimal hints! You start with no clues, and every 30 seconds, a new hint is revealed. The faster you guess, the higher your rank! If you crack the mystery on the first try, you'll achieve the top rank. But beware—every additional hint lowers your score. Can you solve the puzzle before all hints are revealed? Challenge yourself and climb the leaderboard!
offside-description: Offside is a fast-paced logic game that tests your ability to distinguish between truth and deception! You start with 120 points and are presented with six statements—some are true, and some are false. Your goal is to identify the correct ones while avoiding the false ones. But be careful! Every wrong choice deducts points from your score. Can you keep your score high and make the right calls? Challenge yourself and prove your sharp judgment!

questionCreation.title: Create New Question
questionCreation.pageDescription: Create educational questions with hints for students to guess the answer

descriptions.grade: Select the grade level for which you want to create this question.
descriptions.chapter: Select the specific chapter or topic within the subject.
descriptions.hints: Enter up to 5 hints to help students guess the answer. You can leave some hints empty if needed.
descriptions.correctAnswer: Provide the correct answer that students should guess based on the hints.
descriptions.summary: Write a brief summary or description that provides context for this question.
descriptions.question: Enter the main question for the five hints game
descriptions.answer: Enter the correct answer to the question
descriptions.section: Select the section for this question

errors.hintsRequired: Please enter at least one hint

title: EduPlay
subtitle: Where Education Meets Entertainment - A revolutionary platform that transforms learning into an engaging gaming experience for students, teachers, and everyone who loves to learn.
threeWorldsDesc: EduPlay brings together students, teachers, and casual learners in a unified gaming environment that makes education fun and accessible for everyone.
missionText1: EduPlay was born from the belief that learning should be enjoyable, engaging, and accessible to everyone. Our mission is to bridge the gap between education and entertainment, creating an environment where knowledge acquisition becomes a natural and fun process.
missionText2: By empowering teachers with intuitive content creation tools and providing students with gamified learning experiences, we're revolutionizing how education is delivered and consumed in the digital age.
visionDesc: To become the leading platform where education and entertainment converge, making learning a joyful journey for millions worldwide.
innovationDesc: Continuously evolving our platform with cutting-edge technology to create immersive and effective learning experiences.
communityDesc: Building a vibrant community of learners, educators, and knowledge enthusiasts who support and inspire each other.
joinThousands: Join thousands of students and teachers who are already experiencing the future of education.
select-subject-description: Choose a subject to start your learning journey. Select from the available subjects below to access lessons, quizzes, and interactive content.
select-chapter-description: Select a chapter from your chosen subject to dive deeper into specific topics. Each chapter contains detailed lessons, practice exercises, and assessments.
failed-to-add-points: Failed to add points. Please try again.
change-password-error-message: An error occurred while changing the password. Please try again.
